TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataRecord

summary.span: 針對 提供存取每個資料列中資料行值的權限，而且是由存取關聯式資料庫的 .NET Framework 資料提供者所實作。

span.span: Provides access to the column values within each row for a , and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和介面可讓繼承的類別來實作`DataReader`類別。The and interfaces enable an inheriting class to implement a `DataReader` class. 這提供讀取一或多個順向資料流之結果集的方式。This provides a way of reading one or more forward-only streams of result sets. 如需有關`DataReader`類別，請參閱[使用擷取資料 DataReader](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-data-using-a-datareader.md)。For more information about `DataReader` classes, see [Retrieving Data Using a DataReader](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-data-using-a-datareader.md). 應用程式不會建立的執行個體介面直接，但是會建立繼承的類別的執行個體。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits . 一般而言，您可以取得`DataReader`透過`ExecuteReader`方法`Command`物件。Typically, you do this by obtaining a `DataReader` through the `ExecuteReader` method of the `Command` object. 繼承的類別必須實作所有繼承的成員，和通常用來定義其他成員將提供者特有的功能。Classes that inherit must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 提供者實作`DataReader`才能公開 common language runtime (CLR) 型別中的資料。Providers implementing a `DataReader` are required to expose data in common language runtime (CLR) types. 在 CLR 中未包含某些類型的定義類型強制型轉。Type coercion is defined for some types not included in the CLR. 這些值可能會存取為 CLR 型別具有符合替代類型。These values may be accessed as alternative types that comply with CLR types. 例如下, 表列出從 OLE DB 資料類型的建議的對應至 CLR 型別，與括號括住的替代類型。As an example, the following table lists suggested mappings from OLE DB data types to CLR types, with alternative types in parentheses. |OLE DB 型別OLE DB type|CLR 類型CLR type| |-----------------|--------------| |DBTYPE_BOOLDBTYPE_BOOL|Int16Int16| |DBTYPE_BSTRDBTYPE_BSTR|字串string| |DBTYPE_BYTESDBTYPE_BYTES|byte[]byte[]| |DBTYPE_CYDBTYPE_CY|DecimalDecimal| |DBTYPE_DATEDBTYPE_DATE|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DBDATEDBTYPE_DBDATE|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DBTIMEDBTYPE_DBTIME|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DBTIMESTAMPDBTYPE_DBTIMESTAMP|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DECIMALDBTYPE_DECIMAL|DecimalDecimal| |DBTYPE_EMPTYDBTYPE_EMPTY|nullnull| |DBTYPE_ERRORDBTYPE_ERROR|ExternalExceptionExternalException| |DBTYPE_FILETIMEDBTYPE_FILETIME|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_GUIDDBTYPE_GUID|GuidGuid| |DBTYPE_HCHAPTERDBTYPE_HCHAPTER|不支援not supported| |DBTYPE_I1DBTYPE_I1|SByteSByte| |DBTYPE_I2DBTYPE_I2|Int16Int16| |DBTYPE_I4DBTYPE_I4|Int32Int32| |DBTYPE_I8DBTYPE_I8|Int64Int64| |DBTYPE_IDISPATCHDBTYPE_IDISPATCH|objectobject| |DBTYPE_IUNKNOWNDBTYPE_IUNKNOWN|objectobject| |DBTYPE_NULLDBTYPE_NULL|DBNull.ValueDBNull.Value| |DBTYPE_NUMERICDBTYPE_NUMERIC|DecimalDecimal| |DBTYPE_PROPVARIANTDBTYPE_PROPVARIANT|objectobject| |DBTYPE_R4DBTYPE_R4|SingleSingle| |DBTYPE_R8DBTYPE_R8|DoubleDouble| |DBTYPE_STRDBTYPE_STR|字串string| |DBTYPE_UDTDBTYPE_UDT|不支援not supported| |DBTYPE_UI1DBTYPE_UI1|位元組 (Int16)byte (Int16)| |DBTYPE_UI2DBTYPE_UI2|UInt16 (Int32)UInt16 (Int32)| |DBTYPE_UI4DBTYPE_UI4|UInt32 (Int64)UInt32 (Int64)| |DBTYPE_UI8DBTYPE_UI8|UInt64 （十進位）UInt64 (Decimal)| |DBTYPE_VARIANTDBTYPE_VARIANT|objectobject| |DBTYPE_VARNUMERICDBTYPE_VARNUMERIC|不支援not supported| |DBTYPE_WSTRDBTYPE_WSTR|字串string| ## Examples 下列範例會建立衍生的類別的執行個體， ，和。The following example creates instances of the derived classes, , , and . 此範例會讀取整個資料，並將它寫出至主控台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最後，範例會關閉，然後。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

.property instance int32 FieldCount
Public ReadOnly Property FieldCount As Integer
public: property int FieldCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前資料列中的資料行數目。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

value.span: 若未置於有效的資料集中，則為 0；否則為目前記錄中的資料行數目。

span.span: When not positioned in a valid recordset, 0; otherwise, the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會傳回資料列在查詢執行之後 (例如，使用方法)，傳回-1。After executing a query that does not return rows (for example, using the method), returns -1.

Public Function GetBoolean (i As Integer) As Boolean
public: bool GetBoolean(int i);

param.name: i
param.span: 以零為基底的資料行序數。

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

summary.span: 取得指定之資料行的值做為布林值 (Boolean)。

span.span: Gets the value of the specified column as a Boolean.

returns.span: 資料行的值。

span.span: The value of the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會進行轉換。No conversions are performed. 因此，擷取的資料必須已經是布林值。否則會產生例外狀況。Therefore, the data retrieved must already be a Boolean; otherwise an exception is generated.

exception.span: 傳遞的索引超出 0 到 的範圍。

span.span: The index passed was outside the range of 0 through .

MemberSignature.Value: public long GetBytes (int i, long fieldOffset, byte[] buffer, int bufferoffset, int length);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 GetBytes(int32 i, int64 fieldOffset, unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 bufferoffset, int32 length) cil managed
Public Function GetBytes (i As Integer, fieldOffset As Long, buffer As Byte(), bufferoffset As Integer, length As Integer) As Long
public: long GetBytes(int i, long fieldOffset, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int bufferoffset, int length);

param.name: i
param.span: 以零為基底的資料行序數。

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: fieldOffset
param.span: 要開始讀取作業之欄位中的索引。

span.span: The index within the field from which to start the read operation.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要將位元組資料流讀取到其中的緩衝區。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferoffset
param.span: 要開始讀取作業的「緩衝區」 索引。

span.span: The index for buffer to start the read operation.
The number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 從指定的緩衝區位移開始，將來自指定資料行位移的位元組資料流讀取到緩衝區以做為陣列。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 讀取的實際位元組數目。

span.span: The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在欄位中傳回可用位元組的數。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 這通常是欄位的確切的長度。Frequently this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的實際長度如果`GetBytes`已經使用來取得位元組的欄位。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 如果您要傳入的緩衝區`null`，傳回資料列的長度，以位元組為單位。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, returns the length of the row in bytes. 不會進行轉換;因此擷取的資料必須已經是位元組陣列。No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a byte array.

exception.span: 傳遞的索引超出 0 到 的範圍。

span.span: The index passed was outside the range of 0 through .

summary.span: 從指定的緩衝區位移開始，將來自指定資料行位移的字元資料流讀取到緩衝區以做為陣列。

span.span: Reads a stream of characters from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 讀取的實際字元數目。

span.span: The actual number of characters read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在欄位中傳回可用字元的數。 returns the number of available characters in the field. 這通常是欄位的確切的長度。Frequently this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的確切長度如果`GetChars`已經使用從欄位取得字元。However, the number returned may be less than the exact length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 如果您要傳入的緩衝區`null`，`GetChars`以字元為單位傳回欄位的長度。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, `GetChars` returns the length of the field in characters. 不會進行轉換;因此擷取的資料必須已經是字元陣列。No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a character array.

(例如，`DataTypeName`可能是"integer"，而`Type.Name`可能是"Int32"。)(for example, `DataTypeName` may be "integer", while `Type.Name` may be "Int32".)

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetOrdinal (string name);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetOrdinal(string name) cil managed
Public Function GetOrdinal (name As String) As Integer
public: int GetOrdinal(System::String ^ name);

span.span: The name of the field to find.

summary.span: 傳回具名欄位的索引。

span.span: Return the index of the named field.

returns.span: 具名欄位的索引。

span.span: The index of the named field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetOrdinal` 第一次執行區分大小寫的查閱。`GetOrdinal` performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失敗，進行第二個不區分大小寫的搜尋。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. `GetOrdinal` 不會區分假名寬度。`GetOrdinal` is kana-width insensitive. 如果找不到具名欄位的索引，`IndexOutOfRangeException`就會擲回。If the index of the named field is not found, an `IndexOutOfRangeException` is thrown. 因為根據序數進行查閱比具名查閱更有效率，很效率不佳，呼叫`GetOrdinal`在迴圈內。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call `GetOrdinal` within a loop. 呼叫以節省時間`GetOrdinal`一次，並將結果指派給整數變數在迴圈中使用。Save time by calling `GetOrdinal` one time and assigning the results to an integer variable for use within the loop. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用繼承方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the inherited method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetValues (object[] values);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetValues(object[] values) cil managed
Public Function GetValues (values As Object()) As Integer
public: int GetValues(cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ values);

param.name: values
param.span: 要將屬性欄位複製到其中的 陣列。

span.span: An array of to copy the attribute fields into.

summary.span: 使用目前記錄的資料行值填入物件的陣列。

span.span: Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current record.

returns.span: 陣列中 的執行個體數目。

span.span: The number of instances of in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於大部分的應用程式，方法提供有效率的方法用來擷取所有資料行，而不是個別擷取每個資料行。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, instead of retrieving each column individually. 您可以傳遞陣列包含少於一個產生的資料列中所包含的資料行數目。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 資料量陣列，含有複製到陣列。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 您也可以傳遞陣列的長度大於包含在產生的資料列中的資料行數目。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來呼叫具類型的 get 方法之前是否有 null 資料行值 (例如， ， ，依此類推) 以避免引發錯誤。Call this method to see if there are null column values before calling the typed get methods (for example, , , and so on) to avoid raising an error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次執行區分大小寫的查閱。A case-sensitive lookup is performed first. 如果失敗，進行第二個不區分大小寫的搜尋。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. 這個方法是區分假名寬度。This method is kana-width insensitive.
